fieldsOfStudy: General Studies - Security Management & Information Assurance

educations.schoolName: Community College of the Air Force

headline: Security Manager at US Government, ISP, CPP, CISSP, CISM, C|ND, SFPC, SAPPC, SPIPC, ISOC, PSC, SPSC
summary: I enjoy providing solutions and bringing collaboration to the protection of people, information, systems and facilities. My success depends on fostering dialog for multi-discipline security and all-threat, integrated risk management.

defaultPosition.description: Provide guidance and direction of the  physical, industrial and information security, and security oversight, and security training for 50 owned and leased facilities (>1.5 M Sqft) directly supporting over 2500 law enforcement officers, support personnel, and attorneys. Conduct facility security surveys, write SOWs and oversee work for new construction and renovation projects. Regional PIV Card Issuance Manager, with governance over the identity management credentialing system and staff. Please let me know if I can provide any assistance; many hands make for light work. Temporarily managing Region 10 security in Alaska, Idaho, Oregon and Washington.
defaultPosition.location: AK, ID, OR, S. California, S. Nevada & WA
defaultPosition.title: Security Manager

positions.description: Provide guidance and direction of the  physical, industrial and information security, and security oversight, and security training for 50 owned and leased facilities (>1.5 M Sqft) directly supporting over 2500 law enforcement officers, support personnel, and attorneys. Conduct facility security surveys, write SOWs and oversee work for new construction and renovation projects. Regional PIV Card Issuance Manager, with governance over the identity management credentialing system and staff. Please let me know if I can provide any assistance; many hands make for light work. Temporarily managing Region 10 security in Alaska, Idaho, Oregon and Washington.
positions.location: AK, ID, OR, S. California, S. Nevada & WA
positions.title: Security Manager

positions.description: Corporate FSO, practiced in all security disciplines and international programs. Supported over 400 cleared individuals and seven cleared facilities. Fast paced, high speed, low drag organization. Earned DSS Commendable rating in 2008 and 2011.
positions.title: Facility Security Officer, CSSO, ISSO, COMSEC Manager, Corporate Security Administrator

positions.description: Ensured reliable satellite communications; system command and control, and ground segment support for the MILSTAR and Advanced Extremely High Frequency (AEHF) constellations. Skilled at O&M for military & commercial SATCOM, wideband and combat communications systems including Space Operations Squadron (SOPS), Satellite Mission Control Systems (SMCS), secure communications operations, counter-space, COMSEC/Crypto & security inspector duties. Deployments: AFSPC/A2S (2010), 379ECS/SY Qatar (2005-06), Panama, USDOJ.
positions.title: SATCOM Lead and Security

positions.description: Managed the division COMSEC account and provided industrial security, information security, personnel security, physical security, and international security support. Great company, strong talent base. Our Team earned a DSS Commendable rating in 2007.
positions.title: COMSEC Manager, Security Generalist

positions.description: Supported Defense Support Program (DSP), Space Based Infrared System (SBIRS), experimental and MetSat (weather) payload test, integration, inspection and operations. Responsible for factory controlled launch support system, space operations center data communications, satellite ground station operation, orbital telemetry and OC-12 WAN/MAN node. Inspected, tested and qualified hybrid microelectronics through final assembly level products. Great product and people; Team received eight consecutive 100% award fees for DSP. Company was Aerojet Electronics & Space Division until purchased by NGC in 2001.
positions.title: QA/Environmental Test/Ground Station/Telemetry/COMSEC

positions.description: Taught Electronics ECT 101 & 102. Responsible for instructional system and curriculum design. Hardest job you'll ever love. Proof you can come back, GHS class of '79.
positions.title: Teacher

positions.description: Great company. Shipboard Fire Control, Tactical Data Systems and Airborne Launch & Control depot level inspection and repair of amazing and reliable hardware.
positions.title: QA and Electronic Technician

positions.description: First-person video game tech before there were first-person video games. C-5, C-141, A-10 & AT-38 flight simulator operation, maintenance, programming and repair. Electronic, electrical, high-voltage, flight instrument, radio, radar, mechanical, hydraulic, pneumatic, video and computer technician with some assembly language coding.
positions.title: Flight Simulation Technician
